scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, wearing a hat and a pink tunic over a blue robe, sits on a mound of earth, holding a small book and resting his head on his hand. A satchel lies beside him. The background depicts a landscape with rolling hills, trees, and a body of water under a blue sky. A halo encircles the man's head, suggesting he is a saint or holy figure. The scene is framed by an ornamental border, with a hint of text below.
